function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inaccurate testing data may lead to incorrect understanding of the disease spread.","Impact":"Misguided strategies for disease control and spread mitigation.","Mitigation":"Implement strict quality control measures for testing and data reporting.","Technologies":"Blockchain for secure and transparent data recording.","People":"Healthcare professionals, government authorities.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government bodies."},{"Description":"Tampering with patient details can lead to misinformation and incorrect treatment.","Impact":"Treatment of patients based on incorrect information, leading to potential harm.","Mitigation":"Use blockchain technology for tamper-proof patient data recording and retrieval.","Technologies":"Blockchain for secure and transparent data recording.","People":"Healthcare professionals, government authorities.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government bodies."}]}
